Questions? Contact our sales team

sources

#  Verification in real-time

Bank account verification  »

Any bank, any country, instantaneously.

Identity verification  »

Verify the user identity via bank, utility and government data.

Government verification  »

Authenticate government data in real-time.

Document verification  »

Verify any online document from any source globally.

Utility bill verification  »

Any electricity, gas, cable, water or telecom globally.

Business verification  »

Verify good standing directly from government source.

Crypto verification  »

Any crypto custodian, exchange, or wallet.

Improve Ux with real-time decisions

Full automation with JSON file  

Request a demo   » See coverage  »

#### For developers.

  

#### By developers.

With our simple API, you can integrate DIRO with your morning coffee...

API documentation  »

Quick start guide (no code)  »

Get API keys

#### What's your  use case?

  

###### Make the most of our products

Customer onboarding   »

Allow customers to verify their bank accounts securely, in a matter of
seconds, using their login credentials. By integrating with DIRO, customers
can be up and running on the same day.

Payment  »

Instantly authenticate bank accounts for consumers and businesses both
domestic and international. Eliminate the risk of account error, incorrect
name, and confirm good standing.

Lending and mortgage  »

Provide borrowers with an easy and streamlined loan experience. Lenders get
access to bank data to make informed loan decisions in real-time.

Proof of identity  »

Verify user identities using bank, utility, credit bureau, and government data
with built-in impersonation check (bank-grade KYC).

Credit report verification  »

Instant verification of credit score and credit report directly from industry
leaders with global coverage. Authentication in real-time.

Proof of address  »

Instant verification of utility statements and data for proof of address. All
electricity, gas, cable, water, and telecom companies globally.

Merchant onboarding (KYB)  »

Allow merchants to verify their bank accounts securely, in a matter of seconds
using their login credentials. By integrating with DIRO, merchants can be
verified instantly, any bank, any country.

Vendor onboarding (KYB)  »

Allow vendors to authenticate bank accounts, proof of address and incorporate
documents in real-time to eliminate fake and stolen credentials.

Incorporation documents (KYB)  »

Allow companies to verify their incorporation documents and good standing
directly from any government source globally.

Request a demo   »

#### Global coverage

DIRO’s patented solution has coverage in 195 countries and can authenticate
data from any web-source.

With user permission - access all banks, utility companies, credit bureaus,
and government portals in real-time.

See coverage  »

####  Together we build the future of fintech

DIRO's instant bank account verification and proof of address solution helps
us to improve the user experience and enhances our KYC and AML processes.

Miles Paschini

CEO, FV Bank

With DIRO's permission-based bank account verification solution we approve
international clients in real-time.

Nitin Agarwal

CEO, PayGlobal

Participated in UK Government's FCA Sandbox for KYC (London).

Won the most innovative fintech by Citibank in Asean (Singapore).

Invited by FinCEN among first 6 innovations globally (Washington D.C.).

Multiple global patents granted for  
IDV and Document Verification.

Backed by leading VC in Silicon Valley focused on fintech (San Francisco).

Most innovative global fintech at Bank Innovation Ignite (Seattle).

# Pricing

From building to scaling, DIRO has the plan for you.

### Test

## Free

#### Verify any document (domestic or international) up to 10 verifications
per month.

Get API keys

APIs

Management console

### Launch

## Pay as you go

#### Launch your project with unlimited verifications and no contractual
minimums.

Request access

Advanced APIs

Management console

Multi-user security

### Scale

## Enterprise

#### Get tailored solutions, volume pricing, and dedicated support for your
team (500+ verification or more).

Contact sales

Advanced APIs
